block.p: HENRY-Allison. 13. Suddenly at home on December 24, 1997. Beloved daughter of James and Pamela, sister of Katie. Cherished granddaughter of James and Marylyn Curran and Blake and Dorothy Henry and Carol Leslie. Niece of Todd and Gwendolyn Steell, Merrilee Curran, Carol and Laura Henry. In lieu of flowers, please make contributions to: New York Firefighters Burn Center Foundation, C/O Ladder 61, 21 Asch Loop, Bronx, New York 10475. Visitation on Sunday from 25pm and 7-9pm at the Dodge-Thomas Funeral Home, 26 Franklin Avenue, Glen Cove, New York. Funeral services will be held on Monday, December 29, 1997, at St. John's of Lattingtown, 11:00 a.m.
